Data.description: True to tradition it has very round fifty fifty rails all the way through the nose concave. This board really represents everything that Waikiki represents, honestly.
Donald Takayama's legacy is a combination of the worlds best boards, best surfers and best waves, making his boards some of the most sought after in the entire surfing world.
The Firewire Gem TimberTek Surfboard proves that alternative thinking leads to wonderful developments. The Gem is a collaboration between Dan Mann and 3X World Longboard Champion Taylor Jensen.

This is definitely the most loved and sought after model in Donaldâ€™s range. Able to surf anything from one foot slop to overhead barrels, the In The Pink is definitely THE one longboard you must own.
